PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2006-14972006-12-06,  ,  HERITAGE,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of IAN A. McILREATH of Calgary, Alberta, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years, in the place of Costanzo M. Gabriele.
AttachmentsAttachment
